channel.title: Need Help with Java + Client
channel.description:
Baically ive finally got my client and source working, but when i give the client out, some players are getting messages like this:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoclassDeffounderror:sign sign/link at client.main (client.java:2999) caused by: java.lang. classNotfoundexception: sign sign/link
etc.

item.title: Need Help with Java + Client
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

lol I get this on my vps …so have to use the client on my pc xD

( and sorry not sure myself cause vps specs are pretty much same as my pc and it gives that so not entirely sure…)

I have been told before though that it has something to do with variables which I don’t believe is true…

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with Java + Client

caused by: java.lang. classNotfoundexception: sign sign/link
